author: scottbw
msg: Changed the default Shortname and Version to be returned as Null rather than to use special Wookie defaults, as this is the expected behaviour in the W3C spec.

author: julianfoad
msg: Update the BDB "changes" table when starting an obliteration transaction.
This is another step towards implementing "replace an old revision" to be
used for basic obliteration in BDB. The "copies" and "node-origins" tables
(changes_dup): New function to make the new "changes" table entries.

author: scottbw
msg: Implemented test case "ds" - this currently fails due to the encoding issue also affecting most of the other remaining test cases

author: scottbw
msg: Refactored Participants API impl to use the Controller base class and for both ParticipantsController and WaveAPIImpl to share a single Helper class for representing participants in XML and JSON.

author: scottbw
msg: Omit empty values for short name and author in XML output (i.e. don't print "null" as a string)
